title: A master bedroom suite in a large 2br/2b apartments at Willow Glen SJ
posting_body: ['Single occupancy only!!!!', 'A master bedroom with private bath,  a large walk-in closet, and a balcony in your bedroom in a large 2br/2b apartment in Willow Glen.', 'I am a working professional and Looking for a working professional to share this 2 bedrooms apartment.', 'Note:', 'This apartment was built 4 years ago.', 'Everything inside is pretty new.', 'Lease Option:', '12 months lease:     $1700', 'or', 'month to month:    $1900', '+ plus utilities $150, Deposit $400.', 'Landlord charge $100 for garage parking.', 'Plenty of street parking available.', 'Close to downtown San Jose and Campbell.', 'Across the street from the light rail for convenient transportation.', 'Garage parking available for additional fee.', 'Plenty of street parking available.', 'You will have full kitchen access, washer/drier privileges in unit, and there is a pool + gym on the grounds.', ' You will also have access to a key for the apartment and a fob key to the building.', 'I am looking for someone is quiet and respectful, and keep a very tidy space.', 'Please no smoking or pets allowed.', 'This bedroom will be available on August 12, 2022.', 'Text me at:', 'show contact info', 'if you are interested.', 'We can arrange a time to meet up and tour the apartment.', 'Here is a link to the complex website:', '<URL>']
